section.description: General information for this typeface family.

setting.name: Font Family Name
setting.description: The name of this typeface family.

setting.name: Font ID
setting.description: The internal ID code of this font family.

setting.name: Font Folder
setting.description: The font family folder name.

setting.name: Font Version
setting.description: The general version number of this font (Individual font versions my vary).

setting.name: Features
setting.description: The features that will be used for this font.

section.name: Typeface Regular
section.description: Settings for the regular typeface font.

setting.name: File
setting.description: File name for this typeface.

setting.name: Name
setting.description: The name for this typeface.

setting.name: Style
setting.description: The style of this typeface.

setting.name: TeXMapping
setting.description: The TeX font style this typeface maps to.

setting.name: Type
setting.description: The type of font for this typeface.

setting.name: Version
setting.description: The version of this typeface.

setting.name: Font Copyright
setting.description: The copyright information for this typeface.
setting.value: Copyright (C) 1999, The National Font Project (v.beta). Yannis Haralambous, Virach Sornlertlamvanich and Anutara Tantraporn. All rights reserved.

setting.name: Description
setting.description: Any description text included in the font.
setting.value: This font was developed under the National Font Project at NECTEC as to be a free licensed font for Thai users and developers.

setting.name: Modify
setting.description: Request any modifications for this typeface such as bolding.

setting.name: Mapping
setting.description: Specify a file that might contain any character mapping modifications.
